cmb: COOLDOWN: 12/10/8/6
desc: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Heroes affected by Bloodrage will be healed for 25% of the max health of any units they kill. Heroes affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal 25% of their max health to their killer.
notes: Bloodrage can be cast on enemy and allied units, as well as Bloodseeker himself.
lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
name: bloodseeker_bloodrage

attrib:
RITUAL AREA: 600
SILENCE DURATION: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
DAMAGE: 120 / 160 / 200 / 240
cmb:
MANA COST: 100
COOLDOWN: 29/26/23/20
desc: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 3 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
name: bloodseeker_blood_bath

attrib:
VISIBILITY HEALTH: 30%
MOVEMENT SPEED: 10% / 20% / 30% / 40%
DAMAGE: 10 / 20 / 30 / 40
desc: Enables Bloodseeker to sense enemy Heroes with health below a certain percentage, giving him vision of that unit, increased movement speed and increased damage. Bonuses stack per Hero.  Bloodseeker gains True Sight of enemy heroes below half their visiblity threshold.
lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
name: bloodseeker_thirst

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Pure
attrib:
DURATION: 12
MOVE DAMAGE: 20% / 40% / 60%
CAST RANGE: 1000
cmb:
MANA COST: 150/200/250
COOLDOWN: 60
desc: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing massive damage. If the unit moves while under the effect of Rupture, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage.
notes: Cannot use Blink Dagger while ruptured.
lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.
name: bloodseeker_rupture
